mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (name, is_admin, contents, create_time, views, category_id, user_id, file_id, update_time ) VALUES (#{name}, #{isAdmin}, #{contents}, #{createTime}, #{views}, #{categoryId}, #{userNo}, #{fileId}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, name, is_admin, contents, create_time, views, category_id, user_id, file_id, update_time FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET name = #{name}, contents = #{contents}, views = #{views}, category_id = #{categoryId}, user_id = #{userId}, file_id = #{fileId}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE post_id = #{postId}
